definition: to alter a text indiscriminately (idiom)/to make irresponsible criticism
down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action
to reject a word because of the speaker (idiom, from Analects); to judge on preference between advisers rather than the merits of the case
without proof one can't believe it (idiom)
differing only slightly/not much between them
to compose in off-hand way (idiom); to dash off
lit. the eye cannot see the eyelashes (idiom); fig. unable to see one's own faults/to lack self-awareness/truths too close to home
variant of 原原本本[yuan2 yuan2 ben3 ben3]
lies/wild talk/to tell lies/to talk nonsense/fantasy (literature)
don't let rhetoric spoil the message (idiom); don't get carried away with flowery speech to the detriment of what you want to say
